definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

sentences.english: I was impressed with his skills in the backhand smash, the forehand smash, and the drop shot.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾比較喜歡橫拍，因爲他可以輕易地用反手扣球。

sentences.english: Of roots at the top and the much-scratched metal ferrule and spike at the base.
sentences.chinese: 根頂部和急需抓傷的金屬箍和扣球的基礎。

sentences.english: Then Spike Tactical System also exists a wide gap.
sentences.chinese: 接扣球戰術系統同樣也存在着較大差距。

sentences.english: Nobody can possibly save such a smash.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能救起這樣的扣球。

sentences.english: Player plays ball with the intention of constructing an attack.
sentences.chinese: 運動員在傳球的主要目的是組織扣球。

sentences.english: I often miss with forehand shots.
sentences.chinese: 我總是在正手扣球時失誤。
你沒看見，剛纔我那扣球？

sentences.english: Step-around n. A one-footed slide in which the attacker moves around the setter.
sentences.chinese: 扣球手在二傳手周圍一個身位扣球。

sentences.english: Step-around n. A one-footed slide in which the attacker moves around the setter.
sentences.chinese: 扣球手在二傳手周圍一個身位扣球。

sentences.english: He jumped and blocked the spike.
You spiked the ball and put us in the lead.
sentences.chinese: 你的扣球使我們居於領先地位。

sentences.english: Frontal spike technique is a relatively complex technique in volleyball games.
sentences.chinese: 正面扣球技術是排球運動中較複雜的技術動作。

definition: to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc)/to block
to serve the ball/to tee off
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
women's volleyball/abbr. for 女子排球
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
